simplesect.para: NRF_NFCT_HAS_MODULATION_PSEL_REG Symbol indicating whether pin select for modulation control register is present.
NRF_NFCT_HAS_MODULATION_CTRL_REG Symbol indicating whether modulation output select register is present.
NRF_NFCT_HAS_TAG_STATE_REG Symbol indicating whether current operating state of NFC tag register is present.
NRF_NFCT_HAS_SLEEP_STATE_REG Symbol indicating whether sleep state during automatic collision resolution is present.
NRF_NFCT_HAS_AUTOCOLRES_CONFIG_REG Symbol indicating whether automatic collision resolution control register is present.
NRF_NFCT_HAS_PAD_CONFIG_REG Symbol indicating whether NFC pad configuration register is present.
NRF_NFCT_HAS_BIAS_CONFIG_TRIM_REG Symbol indicating whether NFC bias configuration trim register is present.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_NFCT_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_nfct_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified NFCT interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupts priority.
True if interrupts associated with the event mask are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for un-initializing the NFCT interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified NFCT events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of the events to be processed, created by the NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

simplesect.para: Mask of the events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of the NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for saving NFCT parameters before peripheral reset.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure where the parameters will be saved.

briefdescription.para: Function for restoring NFCT parameters after peripheral reset. The parameters are written back to the peripheral registers.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure holding peripheral parameters to be restored.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the the NFCT RX/TX buffer (address and maximum length).

simplesect.para: Buffer for the NFC RX/TX data is used by EasyDMA and must be located in RAM.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the receive or transmit buffer.
Maximum receive or transmit length in bytes (size of the RAM buffer for EasyDMA).
True if buffer is set for the frame reception, false if buffer is set for the frame transmission.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_task_trigger Function for activating a specific NFCT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_task_address_get Function for returning the address of a specific NFCT task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task.

simplesect.para: Task address.
nrf_nfct_event_clear Function for clearing a specific event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the NFCT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_shorts_enable Function for enabling selected shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of shortcuts.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_shorts_disable Function for disabling selected shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of shortcuts.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_shorts_get Function for retrieving the enabled shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Flags of the currently enabled shortcuts.
nrf_nfct_shorts_set Function for setting shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcut mask.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_int_enable Function for enabling the selected interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_nfct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_nfct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_nfct_int_enable_get Function for retrieving the information about enabled interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The flags of the enabled interrupts.
nrf_nfct_int_disable Function for disabling the selected interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_nfct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_mod_ctrl_pin_set Function for configuring the NFCT modulation control pin.

detaileddescription.para: If a given signal is not needed, pass the NRF_NFCT_MOD_CTRL_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Modulation control pin.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_mod_ctrl_pin_get Function for getting the modulation control pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Modulation control pin selection.
nrf_nfct_modulation_output_set Function for setting the modulation output. It enables the output to a GPIO pin which can be connected to a second external.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Modulation control field configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_modulation_output_get Function for getting the modulation output configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured modulation output.
nrf_nfct_error_status_get Function for getting the NFCT error status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The NFCT error status flags, defined in nrf_nfct_error_status_t.
nrf_nfct_error_status_clear Function for clearing the NFCT error status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Error flags to be cleared, defined in nrf_nfct_error_status_t.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_rx_frame_status_get Function for getting the NFC frame reception status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The flags of the NFC frame reception status, defined in nrf_nfct_rx_frame_status_t.
nrf_nfct_rx_frame_status_clear Function for clearing the NFC frame reception status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Status flags to be cleared, defined in nrf_nfct_rx_frame_status_t.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_tag_state_get Function for getting the NFC tag state.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFC tag is disabled.
NFC tag is ramping up.
NFC tag is activated and idle.
NFC tag is receiving data.
Frame Delay Timer of the NFC tag is counting ticks since the last symbol of the last received frame.
NFC tag is transmitting data.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_sleep_state_get Function for getting the NFC tag sleep state during the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value is the last state before the autimatic collision resolution started.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFC tag was in IDLE state before the automatic collision resolution started.
NFC tag was in SLEEP_A state before the automatic collision resolution started.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_field_status_get Function for getting the status of the external NFC field detection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The NFC field detection status. Status bits can be checked by using nrf_nfct_field_state_t.
nrf_nfct_frame_delay_min_get Function for getting the minimum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the minimum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the shortest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The minimum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.
nrf_nfct_frame_delay_min_set Function for setting the minimum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the minimum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the shortest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Minimum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_frame_delay_max_get Function for getting the maximum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the maximum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the longest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame. If no transmission starts before the Frame Delay Timer timeout, NRF_NFCT_ERROR_FRAMEDELAYTIMEOUT_MASK is set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The maximum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.
nrf_nfct_frame_delay_max_set Function for setting the maximum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the maximum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the longest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame. If no transmission starts before the Frame Delay Timer timeout, NRF_NFCT_ERROR_FRAMEDELAYTIMEOUT_MASK is set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Maximum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_frame_delay_mode_get Function for getting the Frame Delay Mode configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured Frame Delay Mode.
nrf_nfct_frame_delay_mode_set Function for setting the NFC Frame Delay Mode configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Frame Delay Mode configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_rxtx_buffer_get Function for getting the pointer to the NFCT RX/TX buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured pointer to the receive or transmit buffer.
nrf_nfct_max_rxtx_length_get Function for getting the NFCT RX/TX maximum buffer length.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured maximum receive or transmit length in bytes (size of the RX/TX buffer for EasyDMA).
nrf_nfct_tx_frame_config_get Function for getting the flags for NFC frame transmission configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The flags of the NFCT frame transmission configuration, defined in nrf_nfct_tx_frame_config_t.
nrf_nfct_tx_frame_config_set Function for setting up the flags of the NFC frame transmission configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Flags for NFCT TX configuration. Use nrf_nfct_tx_frame_config_t for setting.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_tx_bits_get Function for getting the length of the configured transmission frame.
NFC frames do not have to consist of full bytes only, therefore data amount for transmission is configured in number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Number of bits to be sent excluding CRC, parity, SoF, and EoF.
nrf_nfct_tx_bits_set Function for setting up the NFC frame transmission.

detaileddescription.para: Set the number of TX bits excluding CRC, parity, SoF, and EoF.

simplesect.para: Source of data for transmission is set by using nrf_nfct_rxtx_buffer_set.
NFC frames do not have to consist of full bytes only, therefore data amount for transmission is configured in number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Overall number of bits to be sent.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_rx_frame_config_get Function for getting the flags of the NFC frame reception configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The flags for NFCT frame reception configuration, defined in nrf_nfct_rx_frame_config_t.
nrf_nfct_rx_frame_config_set Function for setting up the NFC frame reception.
Destination for the received data is set using nrf_nfct_rxtx_buffer_set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFCT RX configuration flags. Use nrf_nfct_rx_frame_config_t for setting the desired configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_rx_bits_get Function for getting the number of bits received from the NFC poller.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Flag for excluding CRC size from calculation.

simplesect.para: Number of received bits including or excluding CRC, and excluding parity and SoF/EoF framing.
nrf_nfct_nfcid1_get Function for getting the NFCID1 (NFC tag identifier).

This function always returns the full configuration of the NFCID1 setting (10 bytes), regardless of the NFCID1 size. The NFCID1 size can be configured using nrf_nfct_sensres_nfcid1_size_set or nrf_nfct_nfcid1_set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to a buffer for the NDFCID1 parameter. The NFCID1 values are in little endian order, that is: |NFCID1_3RD_LAST|NFCID1_2ND_LAST|NFCID1_LAST|.

simplesect.para: Configured NFCID1 length
nrf_nfct_nfcid1_set Function for setting the NFCID1 (NFC tag identifier).
This function also configures the NFCIDSIZE field in the SENSRES register of the NFCT peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the buffer with NDFCID1 bytes.
Size of the NFCID1 in bytes.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_autocolres_is_enabled Function for getting the setting for the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para: The automatic collision resolution mechanism as defined in ISO 14443-3 and NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification 2.0, section 6.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
If automatic collision resolution is enabled.
If automatic collision resolution is disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_autocolres_enable Function for enabling the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para:
p_reg
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The automatic collision resolution mechanism as defined in ISO 14443-3 and NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification 2.0, section 6.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_autocolres_disable Function for disabling the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para:
p_reg
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The automatic collision resolution mechanism as defined in ISO 14443-3 and NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification 2.0, section 6.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_sensres_nfcid1_size_get Function for getting the NFCID1 size from the SENS_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: NFCID1 (tag identifier) size.
nrf_nfct_sensres_nfcid1_size_set Function for setting the NFCID1 (tag identifier) size.field in the SENS_RES frame configuration.
The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFCID1 (tag identifier) size.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_sensres_bit_frame_sdd_get Function for getting the Bit Frame SDD field from the SENS_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The Bit Frame SDD field configuration.
nrf_nfct_sensres_bit_frame_sdd_set Function for setting the Bit Frame SDD field in the SENS_RES frame configuration.
The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The Bit Frame SDD field configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_sensres_platform_config_get Function for getting the Platform Config field from the SENS_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The Platform Config field configuration.
nrf_nfct_sensres_platform_config_set Function for setting the Platform Config field in the SENS_RES frame configuration.
The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The Platform Config field configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_selres_cascade_check Function for checking the CASCADE bit of the SEL_RES frame.

detaileddescription.para: The CASCADE bit in the SEL_RES register is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware and indicates the status of the NFCID1 read operation to the NFC poller according to the NFC Forum Digital Protocol Speficiation 2.0, section 6.8.2.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
If NFCID1 read procedure is not complete.
If NFCID1 read procedure is complete.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_selres_protocol_get Function for getting the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Value of the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame.
nrf_nfct_selres_protocol_set Function for setting the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Value of the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_selres_get Function for getting the SEL_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: SEL_RES frame configuration.
nrf_nfct_selres_set Function for setting the SEL_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SEL_RES frame configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_pad_config_enable_check Function for checking the NFC pads configuration.

detaileddescription.para: When the NFC pads are enabled, they are configured as the NFC antenna pins, and the NFC pins protection mechanism is enabled. When the NFC pads are disabled, they are configured as GPIO pins.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFC pads are enabled.
NFC pads are disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_pad_config_enable_set Function for enabling or disabling the NFC pad configuration.

detaileddescription.para: When the NFC pads are enabled, they are configured as the NFC antenna pins, and the NFC pins protection mechanism is enabled. When the NFC pads are disabled, they are configured as GPIO pins.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if the NFC pads are to be enabled, false otherwise.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_bias_config_get Function for getting the bias configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with bias configuration parameters.

simplesect.para: nrf_nfct_bias_config_set Function for setting the bias configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure of bias configuration parameters.
